short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically notify user when a searched company exploits and/or supports prison labor

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically notify user when a searched company exploits and/or supports prison labor by using a pop-up. Additionally, the names of products produced by these companies will be replaced with the text "PRISON BLOCK"
